replies.body: Are you still having any issues with this?  There may have been some server issues which could have caused the match to not communicate its end to the servers.  That will usually resolve itself or after relogging.  Let me know!
Did you do the Windows 10 Anniversary Update ? And do you have an NVIDIA GeForce graphics card?

If this applies to you, it may be worth checking out this thread that I made after fixing my problem yesterday..

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/NAXe6XfY-i-may-have-figured-out-the-crashing-problem-guys

Good luck !
I'm having the same issue. Just downloaded the patch and tried to get into a game and it's just saying Reconnect and gives me bug splats. I can't get in and I've restarted League twice.

It sounds like you may have some driver or corrupt game file problems, that would result in bugsplat errors.  I recommend using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to make sure your settings and game files are in order.  That should get you fixed up!
